translation.en: Ah, shit, I can't remember the damn door code.
translation.es: Mierda, no recuerdo el maldito código de ingreso.

translation.en: Is security not there?
Uh, let's just wait. Somebody coming out will let us in.
translation.es: Esperemos, cuando alguien salga nos dejarán entrar.

translation.en: 'Scuse me, oh, miss?
Can you let us in please? We locked out.
- We forgot the code. - Hello?
Oh, here we go.
- We're not gonna rob you. - We work here.
- Okay, wow, this is taking... - Yeah.
We're friendly, we went to college.
translation.es: Somos buenos, fuimos a la universidad.

translation.en: Thank you.
Old ass hoe. Man, I can't believe she did that.
translation.es: Maldita vieja. No puedo creer que hiciera eso.

translation.en: That was insane.
- It's 2020, baby. - It is.
- Yeah, man. - I'm gonna report her to the building.
- Like, we can't be executives? - Exactly.
translation.es: ¿No podemos ser ejecutivos? - Exactamente. - Sí, somos ejecutivos.

translation.en: - - Yeah, we executives.
Hey, could one of you let me in, I forgot my key card.
translation.es: Oigan, ¿alguno me abre? Olvidé mi tarjeta.

translation.en: God damn, that's a... that's a Dracula, man.
- Here we go. - Don't let that biting ass nigga in here.
translation.es: - Y sí. - No le abran al negro mordedor.

translation.en: Wow, really, brother? It's 2020, okay?
I work here. I've got a meeting on the third floor.
translation.es: Trabajo aquí. Me esperan en el tercer piso.

translation.en: - What's the name of the company? - I've got blood in a plastic cup.
translation.es: - ¿En qué empresa? - Tengo sangre en un vaso de plástico.

translation.en: Okay, I'm not gonna bite you, I'm a day walker.
translation.es: No los voy a morder, soy diurno.

translation.en: Damn, he right, I'm gonna let him in.
- Hey, hey, hey, hey, be careful, okay. - Let me in.
Open the door and let me in.
I'm just fucking with you punk bitches.
Hey, can you let me in?
- Well... - Oh, for real?
You really not gonna let me in?
It's 2020, my guy.
I'm here for improv rehearsal.
It's just, I'm allergic to garlic.
translation.es: Es que soy alérgico al ajo.

translation.en: - If you don't open the door-- - Alright, yeah.
translation.es: - Si no me abres... - Bueno, sí.

translation.en: - Open the door. - Here you go.
Ha! Run that cape, son, and that bloodaccino. I'm taking the fangs, too.
translation.es: Entrega la capa y el Sangreccino. También me llevo los colmillos.

translation.en: Trying to get this money in 2020, baby.
translation.es: Así se hace dinero en el 2020, nene.

translation.en: ♪ Hit you with the first line, pow ♪
- Yeah! - Okay.
I don't know if you heard, but Astronomy Club got a Netflix show, baby.
translation.es: ¿Oyeron? El Club de Astronomía tiene un programa en Netflix.

translation.en: Why the name Astronomy Club? We're black and we're all stars.
translation.es: ¿Por qué el nombre? Somos negros y somos estrellas.

translation.en: And like most stars, nobody knows our names.
translation.es: Y como la mayoría de las estrellas, nadie sabe sus nombres.

translation.en: Yep.
- Oh, my gosh. - Wow.
This my room.
Hollywood, we here, living in the same house with twin beds.
translation.es: Hollywood, llegamos y compartimos la casa y las literas.

translation.en: Man, this some bullshit.
The producers wanted to film us living together. Like a reality show.
translation.es: Querían filmarnos viviendo juntos, como en un reality.

translation.en: At first, I thought it was a bad idea. But now that we're here,
translation.es: Al principio, pensé que era una mala idea. Pero ahora que estamos aquí,

translation.en: it's a really bad idea.
I have dibs on this one, this one's mine.
I am here for it.
I'm actually more excited for this than the sketches,
translation.es: Esto me emociona más que los sketch

translation.en: and I will win.
It's not a competition.
Yet.
Hey, there's only seven beds, so somebody's gotta sleep on the couch.
translation.es: Oigan, solo hay siete camas, así que alguien dormirá en el sofá.

translation.en: - Not it. - I'll do it.
I'm the eighth member of the group.
They tend to ignore me. But if I'm easygoing and self- deprecating,
translation.es: Suelen ignorarme. Pero si soy tolerante y me desprecio,

translation.en: then I'm the one who's in charge.
My role in the group is the voice of reason.
translation.es: Yo soy la voz de la razón.

translation.en: Now, in comedy, we call that the straight man. As a gay man, I find that problematic.
translation.es: En la comedia, se le dice el serio y eso me resulta problemático.

translation.en: The rooms are the same, so we don't have to fight over who gets what.
translation.es: Los cuartos son iguales, así que no pelearemos.

translation.en: Actually, hey, hey, actually this room has a moon lamp.
translation.es: De hecho, esta habitación tiene una lámpara de luna.

translation.en: I want that lamp. I'm getting that lamp.
- All right, all right now. - I want the lamp.
translation.es: - De acuerdo, muy bien. - Quiero la lámpara.

translation.en: As the leader of the group--
Man, shut up, you ain't no leader of the group.
translation.es: Cállate, no eres el líder del grupo.

translation.en: Astronomy Club is a group of eight comedians with huge egos.
translation.es: Somos ocho comediantes con egos enormes.

translation.en: It makes my job as leader pretty tough.
translation.es: Eso hace que mi trabajo como líder sea difícil.

translation.en: Shut yo' ass up.
Now I know how Obama felt.
Oh, now it's a competition, motherfuckers.
translation.es: Ahora sí competimos, hijos de puta.

translation.en: It's not easy learning a new skill.
translation.es: No es fácil aprender una nueva habilidad.

translation.en: Here at Dignity and Ambition for Magical Negroes,
translation.es: Aquí en Dignidad y Ambición para los Magos Negros,

translation.en: or D.A.M.N., we help magical Negroes from classic films
translation.es: o DAMN, ayudamos a los magos negros de las películas clásicas

translation.en: go from supporting to lead.
Repeat after me,
I am the lead character of my own story.
translation.es: Soy el protagonista de mi propia historia.

translation.en: I am the lead character of my own story.
translation.es: Soy el protagonista de mi propia historia.

translation.en: I am more than the advice
I give white people.
translation.es: que les doy a los blancos.

translation.en: I am more than the advice
I give white people.
translation.es: que le doy a los blancos.

translation.en: I will not just magically disappear,
once I feel my work is done.
I will not just...
We talked about this.
Hello, my name is Oda Mae,
and it's been 30 days since I last helped a white person, or ghost, find themselves.
translation.es: y hace 30 días que no ayudo a una persona blanca, o a un fantasma, a encontrarse a sí mismo.

translation.en: I mean, it's hard. I can't walk past a pottery class
translation.es: Es muy duro, no puedo ver una clase de alfarería

translation.en: without telling some white woman, You in danger, girl.
translation.es: sin decirle a una blanca: Corres peligro.

translation.en: But as long as I carry around my You ain't a coon coin,
translation.es: Pero mientras lleve mi moneda de: No veneres a los blancos,

translation.en: I remember.
Heads, I'm in charge. Tails, I'm also in charge.
translation.es: Cara, tengo el control. Seca, también tengo el control.

translation.en: I'm in charge.
Magical Negroes seek us out
because they desperately want to serve themselves, not just a white narrative.
translation.es: porque quieren servirse a sí mismos, no solo a la narrativa blanca.

translation.en: Alright Colburn, where we going today?
translation.es: EL CHOFER Y LA SEÑORA DAISY Bien, ¿adónde vamos?

translation.en: Wherever she wants to go.
No, Negro, you're driving yourself today.
No white woman?
Okay.
If I can't drive a white person,
translation.es: Si no llevo a una persona blanca,

translation.en: we all gonna die today.
- - No, no...
This is why we can't use a real car.
translation.es: Por eso no usamos un auto de verdad.

translation.en: Breaking old habits can be a challenge.
Take Bagger Vance, for instance.
He's been in and out of here 15 times.
translation.es: ha entrado y salido de aquí 15 veces.

translation.en: One minute, he's making great progress, and the next,
translation.es: LEYENDAS DE VIDA Progresa mucho y, luego,

translation.en: I'm watching the PGA tournament and...
translation.es: estoy viendo el torneo de golf y...

translation.en: McIlroy about to putt for birdie and...
translation.es: McIlroy está por hacer un birdie y...

translation.en: Wait, there appears to be a trespasser on the green.
translation.es: Momento, parece que hay un intruso en el green.

translation.en: Bagger, honey, this is supposed to be a self- portrait.
translation.es: Bagger, cariño, se supone que es un autorretrato.

translation.en: I need help. I need help.
Sometimes, desperate times call for desperate measures.
John, this here is the white mile.
The goal is to get from point A to point B
translation.es: Debes ir del punto A al punto B

translation.en: without hugging the sickness out of a white person. You think you can do that?
translation.es: sin absorber la enfermedad de ningún blanco. ¿Podrás?

translation.en: I'm so tired, boss,
of living for the white man.
- Let's do this. - Go.
So, he's not gonna heal us?
This is not about you.
translation.es: Esto no se trata de ti.

translation.en: Not today.
Sometimes people ask me, Why this? Why them, why now?
translation.es: A veces me preguntan: ¿Por qué esto? ¿Por qué ahora?.

translation.en: I haven't told anyone this before,
translation.es: No se lo dije a nadie, pero...

translation.en: but my... father was actually a Magical Negro.
translation.es: No se lo dije a nadie, pero... ...mi padre era un mago negro.

translation.en: He was always off helping some white man fulfill his destiny.
translation.es: Siempre ayudaba a un hombre blanco a cumplir su destino.

translation.en: Maybe that's why I'm compelled to do this work.
translation.es: Quizá por eso siento que debo hacer esto.

translation.en: I was his child,
but someone else was always the one.
translation.es: pero el elegido siempre era alguien más.

translation.en: But regardless of my personal hang- ups,
translation.es: Pero a pesar de mis problemas personales,

translation.en: I can tell we're making a real difference at D.A.M.N.
translation.es: sé que hacemos una gran diferencia con DAMN

translation.en: Usually I am the help,
but today, I have found
the broom that I can use for myself, right here,
translation.es: la escoba para limpiar... HISTORIAS CRUZADAS

translation.en: in my heart.
Come on, come on, get in here.
We love you.
'Scuse me?
Uh, sorry, excuse me. I think I might be lost, can anybody help me?
translation.es: Disculpen. Creo que estoy perdido, ¿alguien puede ayudarme?

translation.en: - He what? - I can help you.
- - No, no!
I mean, it's a process.
No, Negro!
He's just looking for a Starbucks!
I need help.
- Open it. Come on. - Okay, a gift.
- Chocolate. - Yeah.
We could use this for the roof.
You shouldn't have.
Mama, Papa, we have an announcement.
We're pregnant.
Our baby's having a baby.
translation.es: Nuestra bebé va a tener un bebé.

translation.en: Rumble, snap, drip.
Don't worry about Gramps, he's got a case of the old PTSD.
translation.es: No le hagan caso, tiene estrés postraumático.

translation.en: Everyone, please, raise your glasses.
And baby makes three.
And baby makes--
Guys, use your napkins.
Don't let go! No!
Caroline, I said use a napkin.
Yeah, keep going. Yeah, that's my little man.
translation.es: Sí, sigue así. Ese es mi hombrecito.

translation.en: And baby makes three.
Rumble, snap...
drip.
Sometimes it's fun to play with your food.
translation.es: A veces es divertido jugar con comida.

translation.en: As per usual, the group ignored my advice
and split into alliances.
That's why we're called Astronomy Club. We're light years apart.
translation.es: Por eso nos llamamos así. Estamos a años luz de distancia.

translation.en: Nigga, shut up.
How do you keep getting in here?
Look, I don't care who gets the moon lamp, as long as one of us gets it, okay?
translation.es: No me importa quién tenga la lámpara, mientras sea una de nosotras, ¿sí?

translation.en: Yeah, but Caroline, do you really want the lamp? You're just so plain.
translation.es: Pero Caroline, ¿quieres la lámpara? Eres tan simple.

translation.en: In a good way.
As little sister of the group, I'm really used to getting along with everyone,
translation.es: Como la menor del grupo, suelo llevarme bien con todos,

translation.en: but if you cross me, I will cut you.
translation.es: pero si me buscan, me encuentran.

translation.en: Ray, Shawtane and I form a real black team.
translation.es: Ray, Shawtane y yo somos el equipo negro.

translation.en: We the only members of AC who grew up in the hood.
translation.es: Somos los que crecimos en el gueto.

translation.en: Well, so did James, but he kind of white.
translation.es: Bueno, James también, pero es algo blanco.

translation.en: I'm the only one on the team who eats mayo.
translation.es: Soy el único que come mayonesa.

translation.en: So, I get to keep the whole jar to myself.
translation.es: Así que el frasco es mío.

translation.en: I have an idea.
What if I rub my junk all over the moon lamp,
translation.es: ¿Y si me froto en la lámpara de luna

translation.en: you know, to mark our territory?
- Don't do that. - I already did.
I was raised Huxtable black,
but I'm not afraid to get down and dirty when the situation calls for it.
translation.es: pero no temo ensuciarme cuando la situación lo amerita.

translation.en: Penis.
I don't care about the lamp.
I just want to write my sexy clown jokes and listen to records,
translation.es: Solo quiero escribir chistes de payasos sexis

translation.en: but I was not about to get stuck with James.
translation.es: y escuchar música, pero no iba a quedarme con James.

translation.en: All right, stay with us, just hold on.
- Just hold on. We need a doctor. - Come on.
- What's happening? - We have a 27- year- old female,
labored breathing, overheating.
We can't say how long she's been in this state, but one thing's for sure,
translation.es: No sabemos hace cuánto está así, pero algo es seguro,

translation.en: she has completely sweated out her edges.
translation.es: se le puso el pelo de punta.

translation.en: My God.
Get this woman to an OR.
We need to lay these edges, stat. Yes, doctor.
translation.es: - Debemos alisar los bordes, ya. - Sí, doctora.

translation.en: What happened? She overextended herself at a Drake concert.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasó? - Estaba en un concierto de Drake.

translation.en: Get her in a heated shower cap. We need to deep condition pre- op to stop the internal frizzing.
translation.es: Denle un gorro de ducha térmico. Humecten para detener el frizz interno.

translation.en: Damn, there must be something in the air.
translation.es: Maldición, debe haber algo en el aire.

translation.en: Yeah, son, called humidity.
How did this happen?
- I used Eco Styler and bee's wax. - Miss, please conserve your energy.
translation.es: - Usé Eco Styler y cera de abeja. - Señorita, conserve su energía.

translation.en: I didn't think there was anything stronger than bee's wax.
translation.es: Creí que nada le ganaría a la cera de abeja.

translation.en: Blow dryer. Blow dryer!
Okay, give her 10 cc's of Jamaican black castor oil.
translation.es: Dale 10 cc de aceite de castor negro jamaiquino.

translation.en: - Bring in the Garnier Fructis. - But, Doctor,
she's a 4C natural. That's hair gel for white people.
translation.es: doctora, es una 4C natural, ese es gel para blancos.

translation.en: A weak bond is our only hope of keeping her edges in tact.
translation.es: Con una unión débil salvaremos los bordes.

translation.en: If we go full hold, we could rip her edges clean off.
But what's that gonna give her? A couple of minutes, half hour tops.
translation.es: Pero solo tendrá unos minutos, media hora como mucho.

translation.en: Well, it's either that or a full edge transplant.
translation.es: Es eso o un trasplante completo.

translation.en: Pass me the defibrillator, I'm gonna shock these God damn baby hairs back to life.
translation.es: Dame el desfibrilador, reviviré a estos malditos cabellos bebé.

translation.en: You're a mad woman.
I will not lose another hairline on my watch.
translation.es: No perderé otro nacimiento de pelo.

translation.en: Do you hear me?
And if you don't like it, you can get the hell out of my OR.
translation.es: Y si no te gusta, puedes salir de mi quirófano.

translation.en: It is the middle of August, the moment she walks out of that door--
translation.es: Es pleno verano, en cuanto salga por esa puerta...

translation.en: I said get the hell out of my OR!
Fine!
Oh, no.
Oh, no.
Doctor?
We have a problem.
A snatched wig, and not in a good way.
There's no way we can save these edges now.
translation.es: No hay forma de salvar estos bordes.

translation.en: I'm calling it. Time of death, 4:15 p.m.
We'll need to contact the family.
Or, I could just like...
- Oh, my God, girl, nuh- uh. We have gel. - You cannot.
translation.es: - Por Dios, tenemos gel. - No lo hagas.

translation.en: - Right here, we've got Garnier. - You know better than that.
translation.es: - Toma Garnier. - Ya sabes cómo es.

translation.en: What is the meaning of this?
- Identify yourself. - It is I,
Robin of Locksley.
I steal from the rich and I give to the poor.
translation.es: Le robo a los ricos para darles a los pobres.

translation.en: I take your gold in the honor
translation.es: Me llevo su oro y el honor

translation.en: - of the people of Nottingham. - Uh- huh.
All the people of Nottingham?
What do you mean?
You got some nerve. You wanna come in here and rob the one rich, black house
translation.es: Qué atrevido. Quieres robar la única casa rica y negra

translation.en: - in Nottingham. - No, sir, I assure you, my message
translation.es: - en Nottingham. - No, señor, le aseguro que traigo un mensaje de verdad y de justicia.

translation.en: is one of truth and of justice.
translation.es: que traigo un mensaje de verdad y de justicia.

translation.en: - Honey, who dis man? - You wanna know dis?
He Robin of Locksley.
He robbing the rich and give to the white.
translation.es: Roba a los ricos y les da a los blancos.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, that's not what is happening here, you're twisting my words.
translation.es: No, eso no es así, tergiversa mis palabras.

translation.en: I give to the poor.
It is a good thing that I am doing.
Who are these poor people? 'Cause when we was poor,
translation.es: ¿A qué pobres? Porque cuando éramos pobres,

translation.en: and I was digging moats, 8:00 to 8:00 every day,
translation.es: y cavaba fosos, de sol a sol, todos los días,

translation.en: 365 days a year,
I ain't seen no white man in green tights
jumping around giving me no gold.
- Where'd it go? - I mean, you can't get to everybody.
translation.es: - ¿Adónde está? - No puedes llegar a todos.

translation.en: You mean you didn't have time to get to the south side of Sherwood.
translation.es: No tenías tiempo de ir al sur de Sherwood.

translation.en: Well, the south side is very dangerous after 9:00 p.m.
translation.es: El lado sur es muy peligroso después de las 9 p. m.

translation.en: There are a lot of thieves and--
Well, I mean, I am a thief, but I'm not that kind of thief.
translation.es: Bueno, yo robo, pero no soy ese tipo de ladrón.

translation.en: You mean, like a black thief?
Shit. Oh, listen,
Um, oh, my motives are pure here.
translation.es: Mis motivos son puros, no hay cuestiones raciales,

translation.en: They're not racially motivated, it's strictly class.
translation.es: Mis motivos son puros, no hay cuestiones raciales, es estrictamente por la clase, es decir, ni siquiera veo el color.

translation.en: I mean, I don't even see color.
translation.es: es estrictamente por la clase, es decir, ni siquiera veo el color.

translation.en: - - It's okay, baby, it's okay, I got it.
translation.es: Está bien, cariño, yo me encargo.

translation.en: Man, I just got this money.
Every time black people get a little bit of money, you wanna come and take it.
translation.es: Cada vez que consigo un poco de dinero, quieres venir a tomarlo.

translation.en: What did I say? My brother.
Put your hand down.
I'm liberal.
- I'm one of you, my man, c'mon-- - Oh, he one of us.
translation.es: - Soy uno de ustedes... - Es uno de nosotros.

translation.en: So, you just out there robbing people with no consequences.
translation.es: Así que le robas a gente sin consecuencias.

translation.en: Let me try that shit. I'd have arrows all up in my ass.
translation.es: Déjame intentar eso. Tengo flechas en el culo.

translation.en: I agree, the police are a problem. I've written about it.
translation.es: La policía es un problema. Escribí sobre eso.

translation.en: - You should read my articles. - Stop.
Just shoot this fool so we can go back to bed.
translation.es: Dispárale y volvamos a la cama.

translation.en: - No, no, no, no, no. - Out.
- I... - Hey, Robin, what's taking so long, man?
Your horse acting crazy outside. Oh, shit.
Is that Marook and Trina? This your crib?
translation.es: Mierda, ¿son Marook y Trina? ¿Es su casa?

translation.en: - What up, boy? - Oh, shit.
- Little John, you know this man? - Oh yeah, we grew up together, man.
translation.es: - Pequeño John, ¿lo conoces? - Sí, crecimos juntos.

translation.en: Whoo! You know, you fucked up robbing this house, right?
translation.es: - La cagaste entrando a esta casa. - Sí.

translation.en: - Yes. - I heard you had a nice spot  on the west side, but I didn't believe it. Damn.
translation.es: Oí que tenías un lindo lugar en el oeste, pero no lo creí.

translation.en: You done come up, brother. Hey?
How come we don't see you no more?
Oh, well, we had to move out.
Did you, though? Did you?
You had to move out? Why you leave the community, Roo?
Well, I mean. Look, you know... After 9:00 p.m., it's not that safe.
translation.es: Bueno, mira, después de las 9 p. m., no es tan seguro.

translation.en: And the schools here are better. So...  Damn.
translation.es: - Y aquí hay mejores escuelas. - Demonios...

translation.en: I guess it's true what they say: soon as a black man gets some moat money,
translation.es: Es como dicen, cuando un negro consigue dinero,

translation.en: he turn his back on the hood.
See Marook, I told you,
streets is talking.
You twisting my words, Trina.
You used to dig moats in the hood.
Now what, you sold the company to the royals?
translation.es: ¿Le vendiste la empresa a la realeza?

translation.en: LJ, my brother, I-- I'm like you.
I promise you, my intentions are pure.
Alright, I'm down for the community. They just can't really afford my rates anymore.
translation.es: Apoyo a la comunidad, pero ya no pueden pagar mis tarifas.

translation.en: Marook, Marook, Marook, you really need to support your community.
translation.es: Marook, debes apoyar a tu comunidad.

translation.en: Put your fist down.
I know you ain't saying some shit. Shut up!
This is a A and B conversation,
translation.es: Hablamos calle A y calle B,

translation.en: and B stands for black.
So see your cracker ass up outta this.
Your man come up here putting his fist up like he know me.
translation.es: Tu amigo levanta el puño como si me conociera.

translation.en: There you are, Robin.
How dare you steal from my one black friend, Marook.
translation.es: ¿Cómo te atreves a robarle a mi único amigo negro, Marook?

translation.en: I gotcha.
Wait a minute, you calling the cops on niggas, Marook?
translation.es: ¿Le envías la policía a los negros?

translation.en: Well, I don't know if I would consider us all to be--
translation.es: Bueno, no sé si todos somos...

translation.en: - Shut up, nigga. - You're coming with me.
Marook, I'll see you out on the green on Sunday.
translation.es: Marook, nos vemos en el green el domingo.

translation.en: - Stay woke! - Hey, man, I'm sorry about that.
Like, he be tripping sometimes, and like,
I'mma talk to him though. He ain't gonna be that way anymore.
translation.es: Hablaré con él. Ya no será así.

translation.en: You owe me shit from back in the day. Trina, you look good, girl.
translation.es: Me debes desde hace tiempo. Trina, te ves bien.

translation.en: Okay, baby.
Even split up, the group couldn't agree. We'd rather suffer together than let one person win.
translation.es: Ni divididos coincidimos. Preferimos sufrir todos a que uno gane.

translation.en: And that's why we're called Astronomy Club.
translation.es: Y por eso nos llamamos así.

translation.en: It is hereby decided that the lamp shall choose its owner.
translation.es: Se decidió que la lámpara elegirá a su dueño.

translation.en: Who is making these decisions?
- The lamp, Jonathan, she just said it. - If your name is announced,
translation.es: La lámpara, Jonathan, recién lo dijo. Si te nombran,

translation.en: you may take one of these roses and stay.
